item.title: Semantic Hotkeys
item.description: Hotkeys are present in nearly all software. However, in my view, both software users and application developers do not realize the full potential of hotkeys I believe the full productivity of hotkeys can be unleashed through the concept of semantic hoteys. First I’ll introduce current problems with hotkeys, then some hotkey definitions, and lastly my proposed solutions. Note: Persuasion through evidence-hardened claims is not my intention; I only wish to express my thoughts.
